edge: Ajay Devgan plays the dual role of Vicky and Rohit Verma in the movie.
In the movie, Ajay Devgan portrays both Vicky and Rohit Verma, who are related characters.
Madhuri Dixit acts as Neha Verma, who is Rohit's wife in the movie.
Sunny Deol makes a special appearance as Sagar, Neha's friend in the movie.
Kiran Kumar plays the role of Ranjan Sharma, who is Neha's father in the movie.
In the movie, Vikram Gokhale essays the character of Pratap Verma, Rohit's father.
Deep Dhillon portrays Bhanwarlal in the movie.
In the movie, Smita Jaykar acts as Aarti Sharma.
Rajeev Verma plays Dr. Ashok, who is Pratap's friend in the movie.
In the movie, Shammi portrays Rekha Verma Rohit's grandmother.
Lalit Tiwari acts as Ashok Sharma in the movie.
In the movie, Asha Sharma plays Sarla.
Jayshree T. Plays Neha's aunt in the movie.
In the movie, Mayur portrays Vikram Bhanwarlal's brother.
In the movie, Brij Gopal acts as Lalit.
Madan Jain plays Avinash in the movie.
In the movie, Tiku Talsania portrays Kishanchand Bhagwandas Chellaramani.
